data.trans: Chuyển sang làm gì tiếp (sau khi đã hoàn thành cái trước)
data.trans_hint: Một số tổng giám đốc và giám đốc điều hành hàng đầu tiếp tục chuyển sang thành lập công ty của riêng họ hoặc trở thành nhà tư vấn độc lập.
data.en_hint: Some general directors and top executives go on to establish their own firms or become independent consultants.
data.content_game_1: Some general directors and top executives go on to establish their own firms or become independent consultants.
data.answer_en_hint: Some general directors and top executives go on to establish their own firms or become independent consultants.

data.trans_hint: Tôi đến văn phòng và thấy rằng mọi đồ đạc của tôi cực kỳ bừa bộn.
data.en_hint: I got to the office and found that my things were all over the place.
data.content_game_1: I got to the office and found that my things were all over the place.
data.answer_en_hint: I got to the office and found that my things were all over the place.

data.trans_hint: Bây giờ đang là cuối năm tài khóa, vì vậy tất cả mọi người đều bận bù đầu đạt được KPIs cho cả năm.
data.en_hint: It is the end of the fiscal year, so everyone is snowed under with work to meet the KPIs for the whole year.
data.content_game_1: It is the end of the fiscal year, so everyone is snowed under with work to meet the KPIs for the whole year.
data.answer_en_hint: It is the end of the fiscal year, so everyone is snowed under with work to meet the KPIs for the whole year.

data.trans_hint: Mặc dù dự án này có vẻ không khả thi, nhưng nếu bạn chia nhỏ nó ra, bạn sẽ thấy rằng nó rất khả thi.
data.en_hint: Even though the project looks impossible, if you break it down, you will see that it is very feasible.
data.content_game_1: Even though the project looks impossible, if you break it down, you will see that it is very feasible.
data.answer_en_hint: Even though the project looks impossible, if you break it down, you will see that it is very feasible.

data.trans_hint: Tôi không nghĩ là mình có thể lọc được thư rác.
data.en_hint: I didn't know that we can filter out spam emails.
data.content_game_1: I didn't know that we can filter out spam emails.
data.answer_en_hint: I didn't know that we can filter out spam emails.

data.content: get something out of the way
data.trans: Xử gọn, hoàn thành việc gì
data.trans_hint: Bằng việc làm những thứ bạn không thích trước, bạn có thể xử gọn chúng và tránh cảm thấy mất động lực cả ngày đó.
data.en_hint: By doing the thing you hate first, you can get it out of your way and avoid feeling unmotivated all day.
data.content_game_1: By doing the thing you hate first, you can get it out of your way and avoid feeling unmotivated all day.
data.answer_en_hint: By doing the thing you hate first, you can get it out of your way and avoid feeling unmotivated all day.

data.trans: Lần lượt, theo thứ tự, từng thứ một
data.trans_hint: Nghiên cứu chỉ ra rằng làm nhiều việc một lúc không hiệu quả bằng làm từng việc một theo thứ tự.
data.en_hint: Research have revealed that multitasking is not as effective as working on the tasks one at a time.
data.content_game_1: Research have revealed that multitasking is not as effective as working on the tasks one at a time.
data.answer_en_hint: Research have revealed that multitasking is not as effective as working on the tasks one at a time.

data.trans_hint: Chúng ta không thể giao dịch với nhiều khách hàng cùng một lúc như vậy. Hãy để từng người một vào.
data.en_hint: We can't deal with such many clients at the same time. Let's have them come in one by one.
data.content_game_1: We can't deal with such many clients at the same time. Let's have them come in one by one.
data.answer_en_hint: We can't deal with such many clients at the same time. Let's have them come in one by one.

data.trans: Làm ai đó mất tập trung
data.trans_hint: Tôi đang gấp rút để hoàn thành trước thời hạn, nhưng John cứ liên tục ghé qua và làm tôi mất tập trung.
data.en_hint: I was rushing about to meet the deadlines, but John kept popping in and putting me off.
data.content_game_1: I was rushing about to meet the deadlines, but John kept popping in and putting me off.
data.answer_en_hint: I was rushing about to meet the deadlines, but John kept popping in and putting me off.

data.trans_hint: Trì hoãn việc mà bạn không thích làm không phải là một hành động khôn ngoan. Thay vì thế, hãy kết thúc nó trước, một lần là xong luôn.
data.en_hint: Putting off what you don't like doing is not a wise action. Rather, finish it first, once and for all.
data.content_game_1: Putting off what you don't like doing is not a wise action. Rather, finish it first, once and for all.
data.answer_en_hint: Putting off what you don't like doing is not a wise action. Rather, finish it first, once and for all.

data.trans: Dành (thời gian, tiền bạc cho việc gì đó)
data.trans_hint: Bên cạnh việc tập trung vào leo thang sự nghiệp, bạn cũng nên dành ra những khoảng thời gian để thư giãn và chăm sóc bản thân.
data.en_hint: Besides focusing on going up the career ladders, you should also set aside some time to relax and take care of yourself.
data.content_game_1: Besides focusing on going up the career ladders, you should also set aside some time to relax and take care of yourself.
data.answer_en_hint: Besides focusing on going up the career ladders, you should also set aside some time to relax and take care of yourself.

data.trans_hint: Tôi cần tập trung vào bản đề xuất mà cần được gửi trước 3 giờ chiều hôm nay, làm ơn đừng để ai làm phiền tôi.
data.en_hint: I need to work on this proposal which needs submitting by 3pm today, please don't let anyone put me off.
data.content_game_1: I need to work on this proposal which needs submitting by 3pm today, please don't let anyone put me off.
data.answer_en_hint: I need to work on this proposal which needs submitting by 3pm today, please don't let anyone put me off.
